text: Ni tachiŵecheta aŵala ŵaŵapedwile umanyilisi ni chikulupi kuti: “Chisimu ŵanganyammwe mwatemi m’chilamusi cha Allah kwikanila lisiku lyakuwukulidwa (m’malembe), sambano ali ni lisiku lyakuwukulidwa (m’malembe alila lyamwalikanilaga), nambo ŵanganyammwe mwaliji nkakumanyilila (yakupatikana kwakwe).”
